channel.title: Pictograph on Sparrowhawk Data
channel.description: Recent content in Pictograph on Sparrowhawk Data

item.title: Data Viztory: Sumerian Tablets
item.description: Join us as we explore the ways data have been visualized throughout history, from ancient times to the modern era. Today we look at Sumerian clay tokens and tablets, which were used at least 6000 years ago and eventually developed into the first writing system.
